attributes.description:
2012 BMW sDrive1.8i Steptronic for sale. Don't miss this awesome BMW. Car comes with full service history at BMW, books and spare key.
Standard Features: Rear PDC, Bluetooth, Air Con, Power Steering, Air Bags, Electric Mirrors & Windows, Central Locking, Mag Wheels, Multi-Function Steering Wheel, Black Leather Interior, CD Player, Aux Plug, USB Port, Tow Bar, Smash & Grab and Sunroof.
Trade-Ins are Welcome.
Finance can be arranged with all major banks with a additional administrative fee. Warranty options are available.

BMW X1 sDrive1.8i Steptronic
Power - 110 kW @ 6400 rpm
Torque - 200 Nm @ 3600 rpm
Economy - 10.5 l/100km
Emissions - 132 g/km
Emissions Rating - EU5
Gears - 6 / REAR
Acceleration - 8 seconds
Top Speed - 200 km/h
Airbags (total) - 6
Length - 4,477 mm
Seats - 5
Fuel Tank Capacity - 61 liters
Boot Capacity - 420 liters
Service Intervals - 15,000 km
